attributes.action: MAKE DIESEL AROUND THE SAME COST AS PETROL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Diesel is suppose to be more economical and more environmentally friendly. It should be brought back down in price to around the same cost as petrol.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=reduce+diesel&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=troop+tax&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
